General.Name: Shanghai Yanpu Metal Products Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Yanpu Metal Products Co., Ltd designs, manufactures, and sells stamping parts, assembly and welding parts, and stamping dies in China. Its products include car seat, skylight, engine, and lock stamping parts; and seat assembly and window shaker stamping parts. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No. 61 Nanjing East Road, Shanghai, China
